Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier report of a minor fire at track level at Chicago. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier report of a minor fire at track level at Chicago. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
